name: RedShift Networks, Inc.
overview:
With the advent of the new generation of smart phones and tablet devices like IPAD, real rich media real-time (VOIP & Video) communications is becoming a reality and enterprises are investing billions in Unified Communications & Collaboration applications and networks.

RedShift Networks is a technology company in the fast growing Cloud and Enterprise Based UC & C (VOIP/Video) Security space. UC & C is projected to become an $87B market by 2014 and the UC & C as a Cloud Service market to be a $5.6B by 2014. RedShift estimates that the total addressable market for UC & C Security is projected to be $1.7B by 2014.
